Contact Us
WE WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU
Thank you for visiting YES Communities. If you are looking for more information on any of our communities, please complete the form below to contact us and one of our team members will reach out to you shortly!

Start_Module_391
About Yes Communities
CREATING COMMUNITIES TOGETHER
The YES name is the foundation of our culture; one that aims to be positive in all aspects of our business.  We commit to investing in our residents by providing friendly, inviting neighborhoods so that, together, we can create communities we call home.
End_Module_391
Start_Module_748
YES Brand Anthem
The story of YES told from three different perspectives painting a picture of where YES is headed in 2023 and beyond.
End_Module_748
Start_Module_721
The YES Story
YES Communities is proud to present our newest brand film on who we are and how we make an impact on affordable and manufactured housing across the country.
End_Module_721
Start_Module_697
What Living Means
to our residents
Find out What Living Means to our valued residents at various YES Communities across the country and ask yourself, What does Living Mean to You and how can YES Communities help you achieve it.
End_Module_697
Start_Module_678
MEET AARON MCGINNIS
A YES TEAM MEMBER
See Aaron's story and his experience as a YES Team Member at The Stables in Sevierville, Tennessee.
End_Module_678

MEET A RESIDENT
Hello from Rasha
See Rasha's story and how she came to love her YES Community at Sweetgrass Estates in South Carolina.
End_Module_392

Start_Module_393
Rent
WHY SHOULD I SAY YES TO RENTING A HOME?
Our team is committed to helping you enjoy the conveniences of a low-cost, attractive home that fits your needs. Our residency process is easy to navigate and rental to sale options are available after 6 months of residency in good standing.
our rental homes have a yard
we are pet friendly
parking is just a few steps away from your front door
buy
why should i say yes to buying a home?
Our lending partners provide multiple approaches to financing.
Co-signer programs
Second-home purchasing programs
"Buy for" programs for relatives to assist with a home purchase
Foreclosure forgiveness
Rental residents programs to qualify to purchase their home
End_Module_393
Start_Module_464
PETS WELCOME
PETS ARE A PART OF THE YES FAMILY
We know that your pets are part of your family and we welcome them to our communities. Pets enjoy our dog parks and getting out to socialize and play.  Please contact your community for details and if they offer a dog park at your community.
Pet Policy
End_Module_464
Yes Amenities
Start_Module_395
CONNECTING WITH YOUR COMMUNITY
Our communities provide planned resident activities and events throughout the year. We also offer amenities such as pools, playgrounds, activity centers, dog parks, clubhouses and much more! Come connect with your community and neighbors today!
End_Module_395
Start_Module_396
Find a Home
Find a Community
Contact Us
End_Module_396
Start_Module_397
YES GREEN
COMMITTED TO MAKING OUR COMMUNITIES MORE GREEN
Our commitment to our residents extends to our YES Green program, which dramatically decreases utility costs through conscious awareness of the resources we are using and the choices we make. We offer utility saving plans and recycling programs that pass along big savings to our customers and help the planet.
End_Module_397
Start_Module_398
YES WE CARE
BUILDING COMMUNITY THROUGH COMPASSION AND TEAM WORK
The YES We Care Program has been created to assist our residents, team members and local organizations when they need it most.  Our program includes Helping Hands which gives back to residents, the community and local charitable organizations and Hug a Home, which helps to revitalize homes in our communities.  Our culture is one of caring and being a good neighbor which is part of who we are at YES.
End_Module_398
Start_Module_399
End_Module_399
